td.content: s:white female retired aged 78 Ys complains of recurrent mild diarrhea over the past month. The patient reports mild flatulence. she has a history of smoking she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 163 cm, Weight 90.3 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation, HEENT: WNL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed famotidine - 40 mg daily, and ordered Urea breath test.
